name: ABN_ORDERS
description: The ABN_ORDERS table contains the orders associated with Advanced Beneficiary Notice note records.

columns.name: ABN_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the order ID associated with the ABN record.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The order ID that is associated with the ABN record.
